content: learn how to crochet the puff post square - super cute and quick to make vastly easier than it looks it is made over 4 rounds so the pattern is easy to memorise and the finished effect of the crochet square is a gorgeous textured starburst you can use any yarn and hook you would like hook size s according to your yarn yarn used in my variegated squares red heart super saver prints in the shade ocean & red heart super saver white with a 5 5mm hook
